short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speak Chinese like a native! Multiple Category Selection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn Chinese Vocabulary and Phrases with Ease!

Boost your Chinese language skills with our comprehensive Chrome extension! Perfect for beginners and advanced learners alike, this tool offers:

Random Chinese Phrases: 

Select from various categories such as HSK 1, HSK 2, Sentence Structures, Food, Taiwanese Slang, and more to receive a random phrase with detailed translations.


Interactive Learning: 

Engage with dynamic content designed to improve your vocabulary and understanding of Chinese.

Flashcards and Videos: 

Create custom flashcards and watch educational videos to enhance your learning experience.

User-Friendly Interface: 

Enjoy a clean, easy-to-navigate interface that makes learning Chinese fun and straightforward.

Whether you're preparing for exams, planning to travel, or simply want to enhance your language skills, our extension is the perfect companion. Start learning Chinese today!
